description.p: Bulk allows a lot of record inserts to be done at once, good for initailly populating collections.

section.title: Populate MongoDB from another DataSource
section.example:
dim cn as sql::Connection cn.Open("::Name::AADemo-Northwind")
dim tables as c = cn.ListTables() for each table in tables cn.PortableSQLEnabled = .t. if cn.Execute("select * from "+table.value) then dim rs as sql::ResultSet rs = cn.ResultSet dim json as c = rs.ToJSON() dim mongo as extension::MongoDB = extension::MongoDB::Create("mongodb://localhost:27017","Northwinds",table.value) mongo.BulkOperation("{ \"insert\" : true , \"documents\" : "+json+" }") end if next

description.p: This example quickly populates mongo from the tables in Northwinds.
